review_blob: Good white beer with a nice flavor and then with a nice fruity bouquet.after opening the bottle the joy starts for me

My first ratimg so be gentle. My supermarket in Holland lately offers different exotic beers next to the big Dutch and German breweries. Tried a can of Becks. Not really my taste. Bit of a dishwasher taste back in the mouth. Not a really unique taste to it. I love german beer but this is not the one.
